resolutions.title: Get in Shape
resolutions.description: Need to track my health and get in shape. I packed on several pounds in 2017 and I aim to lose a decent amount of weight.

resolutions.title: Learn Flow-typed and Reason
resolutions.description: I shied away from Flow and Reason in 2017 because of a lack of understanding behind why one would use them over Javascript. So 2018 will be the year for experimenting with these new tools.

resolutions.title: Work on More Side Projects
resolutions.description: This one is fairly self explanatory, I want to get into the habit of working on my side projects each free night instead of just consuming content.

resolutions.title: Travel More
resolutions.description: I generally travel twice a year now-a-days, however I want to spend the majority of that time out and about visiting new places. I also want to get out and about in Boston more often as well.

resolutions.title: Capture More
resolutions.description: I have one of the best cameras I will ever own attached to my phone. I want to get out more and start taking more photos and videos of the world surrounding me.

resolutions.title: Improve my Personal Site
resolutions.description: I want to both make my current personal site more professional as well as more creative and a better place to document my life (maybe migrating this website to it) and also build a place to share my photography as well.
